review: Excellent quality of treatment. Great team they have. I would recommend to go here for any kind of dental treatment.

We want to salute Dr Parag for his rich experience and expertise in dental treatment combined with his down to earth simple patient friendly attitude. We were in Mumbai for vacation and suddenly my wife had severe unbearable pain of wisdom teeth so I did some research for high recommended dentists around our hotel near Jogeshwari and decided to consult with Dr Parag. By God's grace our decision turned out to be extremely good and we were able to complete our vacation without any hassles.

Superb Experience and on-time appointment. Doctor Khatri patiently listens to the problem and patients history. Went for teeth cleaning, the procedure was quick too. Dr Khatri is very humble and staff too at the clinic is courteous.

review: Dr Parag saw my wife for denture for her missing side teeth. His suggestion to go for a single denture that worked too well. With all the impression done he prepared a trial day when he adjusted the denture to fit her well. On the final day and with a minor adjustment the denture fitted like a glove. She was now able to use both sides of her teeth while having food. But after trying tye new denture for few days she found that it will need further adjustment. Dr Parag saw her the same morning and did the minor adjustment that needs to be done. The final fit was too good. We are so please with his approach to his patients and for his patience to listen to any issue that we may present to him. Absolutely wonderful experience.. in fact we live in UK, but we now have a dentist in Mumbai.. thanks Dr Parag ..
reply_text: Thank you so much sir and ma‚Äôam for such a wonderful elaborated write up. Thank you for showing faith in us and coming all the way from London to do dental treatment . Dr Parag Khatri not only made my complicated wisdom tooth removal a painless process[during and after], but also took care of all my anxiety related a visit to a dentist.
In simple words, "they don't make doctors like Parag Khatri anymore".  Thank you sir.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: This was the first time a numbing injection has hurt so much. He kept stabbing it at different points and the whole procedure was very rushed. I‚Äôm now left with odd pains in my mouth ******* ** *** ********* *** there‚Äôs skin peeling out in the part where he injected. I had to scream out for him to realise the injection was hurting and they promptly gave me a painkiller. Eating has become difficult now and never did I anticipate such a problem from a numbing injection. Won‚Äôt go again.
reply_text: This is really sad and disheartening! We are very much sorry and asking for forgiveness for the whole experience they have narrated. The procedure went smooth - patient was very late for the appointment- still was accommodated with no rush and wanted to complete the procedure with 2 complex fillings involving numbing injection - which was not painful as described - numbing gel was applied before . Skin ulcer on the side of injection usually happens due to unknowingly chewing cheek skin on the numb site causing ulceration - also they never reported anything to us before writing on wall . We still are very sorry for everything  and request to everyone if any complaint or unforeseen happens please contact us immediately before writing publicly - we are here to serve üôèüèª SORRY ! !
